HTTPStatus102.summary: The HTTP 102 Processing informational status response code indicates to client that a full request has been received and the server is working on it.

remarks.para: This status code is only sent if the server expects the request to take significant time. It tells the client that your request is not dead yet.

blockquote.para: Note: This status code is deprecated and shouldn't be sent any more. Clients may still accept it, but simply ignore them.
